name: Buggy
storyline: The game features a story mode, where you race your way through several "hubs", each consisting of 2-5 maps. After completing all maps, you unlock the next hub. Completing a hub grants you a new buggy racer.
summary: Buggy is a buggy/RC racing game, where the player assumes control of various different vehicles to race and combat other opponents for trophies and glory. The game features an open world hub, with individual levels having portals to their respective levels.
